Detailed Description

This class is used to handle vCard.

This class is useful when you don't want to know vCard data in detail. We could get lots of information in .vcf file onEntryCreated().

The following example demonstrates how to use the VCardEntryHandler class.

 class MyHandler : public gaia::vcard::VCardEntryHandler {
   public:
     void onStart() {
         // Handle onStart()
     }

     void onEntryCreated(gaia::vcard::VCardEntry* entry) {
         // We could get information from .vcf file from entry.
         gaia::base::String name = entry->getDisplayNmae();
     }

     void onEnd() {
         // Handle onEnd()
     }
 };

virtual void gaia::vcard::VCardEntryHandler::onEnd ( ) [pure virtual]

Called when the parsing ended.

Able to be use this method for showing performance log, etc.

virtual void gaia::vcard::VCardEntryHandler::onEntryCreated ( const gaia::vcard::VCardEntry *  entry) [pure virtual]

The method called when one vCard entry is created.

Children come before their parent in nested vCard files.

e.g. In the following vCard, the entry for "entry2" comes before one for "entry1". BEGIN:VCARD N:entry1 BEGIN:VCARD N:entry2 END:VCARD END:VCARD
